Global IDV - (Argentina)
Verifying your customers registered first and/or last name to address information, address type and length of residency. In conjunction with their date of birth, phone details and national ID.

NAME

ADDRESS

DATE OF BIRTH

GENDER

NATIONAL ID

PHONE ID ADVANCED

Document ID OCR
Automatically verify ID documentation for quality and formating in real-time, while also reviewing documentation for scrapped data. Comes with easy upload facility and file management area.

DRIVERS LICENCE

IDENTITY CARD

PASSPORT

RESIDENCE PERMIT

TRAVEL DOCUMENT

VISA

= Document with MRZ read and verified.

= Document with MRZ and VIZ consistency verified.

Document ID Video
Review and validate ID documentation in real-time through our interactive tool consisting of a live webID agent to verify customers instantly over live chat with their documents.

DRIVERS LICENCE

IDENTITY CARD

PASSPORT

RESIDENCE PERMIT

TRAVEL DOCUMENT

VISA

= Document ID live chat verification with a webID agent.

= Bafin compliant Document ID live chat verification with a webID agent.

Document ID Manual
Verify government issued ID documents or utility bills for quality and formating, scrapped data, and reputation. Comes with easy upload facility and file management area.

4Stop aggregates an array of data sources under each KYC data source service. Through our multi-level KYC you can configure cascading KYC verification logic to maximise your data experience performance and verify customers in the most cost-efficient manner possible. All while having full confidence your KYC for compliance and fraud prevention is managed.

For more information on our country coverage or our data source hit rates please contact a representative at sales@4stop.com for more information.

We believe in innovative access to KYC validations that simplify compliance, regardless of regulatory requirement updates, whilst protecting against fraud. Allowing businesses to grow their business around the globe with confidence.
